title: Never-before-seen malware is nuking data in Russia’s courts and mayors’ offices
description: CryWiper masquerades as ransomware, but its real purpose is to permanently destroy data.

title: Report: Apple’s upcoming VR and AR operating system has a new name
description: Bloomberg report claims that Apple has begun referring to it as "xrOS."

title: FCC lets Starlink start deploying Gen2 satellites as Gen1 speeds keep falling
description: US speeds have dropped from 105Mbps to 53Mbps—but 7,500 new satellites will help.

title: No, physicists didn’t make a real wormhole. What they did was still pretty cool
description: "Don't hold your breath about sending your dog through a wormhole."

title: Ohio measles outbreak nearly triples, expected to last “several months”
description: "Don't wait. Don't wait until after the holiday. Get them vaccinated now."

title: PCI standards group deflects, assigns blame for melting GPU power connectors
description: "Members are responsible for safety testing of their products."

title: Parler and Twitter both cut ties with Kanye West as he says, “I like Hitler”
description: Parler announced deal termination after Ye told Alex Jones, "I also love Nazis."

title: Tesla finally delivers first electric Semi to Pepsi after years of delay
description: Most recently, Tesla promised to produce 50,000 Semis in 2024.

title: Proton Calendar rounds out security-focused Big Tech alternative on iOS
description: App promises end-to-end encryption, advanced cryptography for your schedule.

title: After bankruptcy and war, OneWeb turns to a competitor for help
description: OneWeb, as ever, is doing what it needs to do to survive.

title: Twitter dangles incentives to try to lure advertisers back
description: “They sound like the guy playing the violin on the Titanic," says a senior media buyer.

title: Rocket Report: SpaceX launch delayed indefinitely; Virgin Orbit cancels funding round
description: "Due to current market conditions, the company has elected not to proceed."

title: The 2023 Ferrari 296 GTS—we drive Ferrari’s plug-in hybrid convertible
description: Maranello moves to a V6 plus electric motor for its latest mid-engined supercar.

title: The Callisto Protocol review: A relentless horror spectacle
description: A new vision of sci-fi survival-horror updates the pace for classic scares.

title: Prescription poop is here: FDA approves fecal slurry for unshakeable diarrhea
description: It's a win for those with C. diff and a milestone for microbiome-based therapies.
